main_definition: To examine or consider the similarities and differences between two things.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To evaluate the similarities and differences of two objects, actions, ideas, etc., often for comparison purposes.
meanings_and_examples.example: When comparing two cars, we look at their price, fuel efficiency, and features.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as a verb to describe the act of evaluating one thing against another in order to determine similarities or differences.
meanings_and_examples.example: His performance this year was compared to his performance last year, showing significant improvement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used informally when two things are considered roughly equal or almost the same in some respects.
meanings_and_examples.example: The two products have similar qualities; they're basically compared on price and durability.
